textAfterTable: Game Overview Asterix is a platform game developed by Bit Managers (NES & GB) and Infrogrames (SNES) for the Game Boy, NES, and SNES and released exclusively in Europe. In the game, players control Asterix through multiple levels located all across Europe, fighting Romans and various aggressive animals along the way, to rescue his friend Obelix.
